column4: Lanoxx-> what are you attempting to do? using encryption or clear? which chip does your wifi have?
no am not just going to read what you paste, can you explain what happens?
iwl4965, i have an intel chip
the problem is not even the route sind i didnt even get an dhcp lease...
and this morning a also had the same problem and then eth0 was off
i know about routes (i even have a cisco training) but thats not my problem
the problem is that i dont get dhcp leases even though the AP has no encrytion, and when i look in to the log files i find strange authentication with <MAC> times out. errors
yes, i know its clear since its my university AP and i still had been logged in till yesterday, then today it suddenly doesnt work
howevery if i boot to 2.6.23 then i dont have any problem at all
no it does not get an ip address
it looks as if its connected, e.g is see an AP name and link quality like 75/100 and so on
